mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( payment_id, reservation_id, payment_price, payment_method, payment_status, pg_transaction_id, paid_at ) VALUES ( #{paymentId}, #{reservation.reservationId}, #{paymentPrice}, #{paymentMethod}, #{paymentStatus}, #{pgTransactionId}, #{paidAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT('pay_', LPAD( IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(payment_id, 5) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) + 1, 4, '0' )) FROM payments
mapper.update: UPDATE payments SET payment_status = 3, -- 예: 3 = 환불됨 refund_amount = payment_price, updated_at = NOW() WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
